item.title: Health: A Key Metric That Is Hard for Gadgets to Read
item.description: Blood Pressure: A Key Metric That Is Hard for Gadgets to Read Blood pressure is a key health metric that can be used to track overall cardiovascular health. It is important to monitor blood pressure regularly, and to see a doctor if you have any concerns about your blood pressure.
